1.Title: Summoning Arcanum
1.Description: When the equipper activates an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, they gain 1 stack of a buff. Each stack increases the equipper's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>4%</color>, up to 3 stacks, and lasting 20s. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s, and repeated triggers reset the duration. At 3 stacks, the equipper's CRIT Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>6.5%</color>.
